pullrequest.title: Added tests to Event, PIMPL-ized it, and fixed bugs

content.raw:
nice start with pimpl! especially one with templates

- I think if possible we want to avoid installing private header files, hence not to include `EventPrivate.hh` in `Event.hh` but forward declare it. It's hard to do this with templates but I'll poke around to see how that can be done.

- We can also consider merging the `EventPrivate.cc` into `Event.cc` so we don't end up with double the amount of files we have in gazebo.

- Another thing to consider is using a shared pointer for the data pointer

nice start with pimpl! especially one with templates

  • I think if possible we want to avoid installing private header files, hence not to include EventPrivate.hh in Event.hh but forward declare it. It's hard to do this with templates but I'll poke around to see how that can be done.

  • We can also consider merging the EventPrivate.cc into Event.cc so we don't end up with double the amount of files we have in gazebo.

  • Another thing to consider is using a shared pointer for the data pointer
